text: Éva Schubert (19 January 1931 – 11 July 2017) was a Hungarian actress. She was known for her roles in Egy pikoló világos, Felmegyek a miniszterhez, and for Frakk, a macskák réme. She won a Kossuth Prize in 2013 for her lifetime achievement. She was born in Budapest. Schubert died on 11 July 2017 in Budapest at the age of 86.Meghalt Schubert Éva ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1931 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Hungarian movie actors Category:Hungarian television actors Category:Actors from Budapest
title: Éva Schubert
